meanings.definition: The state or process of bubbling or fizzing.
meanings.sent1: The effervescence of the soda was a delight to watch.
meanings.sent2: The effervescence of the champagne tickled my nose.
meanings.sent3: The effervescence of the bath bomb made bath time more fun.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had an effervescence that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The effervescence of the boiling water was like a mini volcano erupting.

meanings.definition: The quality of being lively or enthusiastic.
meanings.sent1: The effervescence of the children playing in the park was contagious.
meanings.sent2: Her effervescence at the party made everyone smile.
meanings.sent3: His effervescence about the new video game was endearing.
meanings.sent4: The effervescence of the crowd at the concert was electrifying.
meanings.sent5: The effervescence of her personality was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
